greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3^n mod n.
link: Harry J. Smith and Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (first 1000 terms from Harry J. Smith)
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b066601.txt", n, " ", 3^n % n) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Mar 09 2010
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Dec 22 2001
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 27 2001
